note:
Heya, I'm Perry. Professional computer-toucher and outdoor-sports enthusiast.

Actually part of the fediverse since longer than this. But this alt is more about my private life. Finding myself 'n stuff. Oversharing without having to fear that people I know IRL will read it.

It's also about connecting more deeply with the fediverse, so feel free to interact with me. I'll likely appreciate it since I sometimes have problems reaching out.

My profile pic was drawn by @katje@mirageisland.nl
It shows an antracite platypus with a beige belly and beak. Its eyes and tail are red. It's also wearing a red bow tie.

If I say anything inappropriate, don't CW something that should be, or there are any other issues, please tell me and I'll try to fix it and change my behaviour.

#nobot #noindex #noarchive #nobridge
